languages.text: {n}Идира роняет пси-удушитель на пол, где он разбивается на миллион мельчайших осколков.{/n} "Я... я сделаю это. Лорд-капитан. Я впущу в себя шепотки. Лучше отойдите на случай... Ну, сами понимаете на какой случай".

{n}Idira drops the psy-stifler on the floor, where it shatters into a million tiny pieces.{/n} "I'll... I'll do it. Lord Captain. I'll let the whispers in. You better step back in case... well, in case you-know-what."
languages.original_text: {n}Идира роняет пси-удушитель на пол, где он разбивается на миллион мельчайших осколков.{/n} "Я... я сделаю это. Лорд-капитан. Я впущу в себя шепотки. Лучше отойдите на случай... Ну, сами понимаете на какой случай".

traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}伊迪拉将灵能抑制器摔在地上，它像镜子一样碎成了无数碎片。{/n}“我……我会这么做的，舰长大人。我会让那些低语的声音进来。你最好退后一些，以免……嗯，你知道以免发生什么事情。”
languages.original_text: {n}Idira drops the psy-stifler on the floor, where it shatters into a million tiny pieces.{/n} "I'll... I'll do it. Lord Captain. I'll let the whispers in. You better step back in case... well, in case you-know-what."

traits.locale_text: {n}伊迪拉将灵能抑制器摔在地上，它像镜子一样碎成了无数碎片。{/n}“我……我会这么做的，舰长大人。我会让那些低语的声音进来。你最好退后一些，以免……嗯，你知道以免发生什么事情。”
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}Idira tira al suelo el supresor psíquico, haciéndolo estallar en un millón de esquirlas.{/n} «Lo... lo haré, Lord Capitán. Dejaré entrar a los susurros. Más le vale alejarse un poco, por si... bueno, ya sabe».
languages.original_text: {n}Idira drops the psy-stifler on the floor, where it shatters into a million tiny pieces.{/n} "I'll... I'll do it. Lord Captain. I'll let the whispers in. You better step back in case... well, in case you-know-what."

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira tira al suelo el supresor psíquico, haciéndolo estallar en un millón de esquirlas.{/n} «Lo... lo haré, Lord Capitán. Dejaré entrar a los susurros. Más le vale alejarse un poco, por si... bueno, ya sabe».
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}Idira lässt den Psi-Drossler auf den Boden fallen, wo er in eine Million winzige Stücke zerspringt.{/n} "Ich ... ich tue es. Lord Captain. Ich lasse das Geflüster hinein. Tretet lieber zurück, falls ... nun ja, Ihr wisst schon."
languages.original_text: {n}Idira drops the psy-stifler on the floor, where it shatters into a million tiny pieces.{/n} "I'll... I'll do it. Lord Captain. I'll let the whispers in. You better step back in case... well, in case you-know-what."

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira lässt den Psi-Drossler auf den Boden fallen, wo er in eine Million winzige Stücke zerspringt.{/n} "Ich ... ich tue es. Lord Captain. Ich lasse das Geflüster hinein. Tretet lieber zurück, falls ... nun ja, Ihr wisst schon."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}イディラがサイ・スティフラーを床に落とすと、それは粉々に砕け散った。{/n}「あたいが…あたいがやるわ、ロード・キャプテン。囁きを受け入れる。万が一に備えて…いいえ、例の事態に備えて下がっていて」
languages.original_text: {n}Idira drops the psy-stifler on the floor, where it shatters into a million tiny pieces.{/n} "I'll... I'll do it. Lord Captain. I'll let the whispers in. You better step back in case... well, in case you-know-what."

traits.locale_text: {n}イディラがサイ・スティフラーを床に落とすと、それは粉々に砕け散った。{/n}「あたいが…あたいがやるわ、ロード・キャプテン。囁きを受け入れる。万が一に備えて…いいえ、例の事態に備えて下がっていて」
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}Idira laisse tomber le carcan psychique qui se brise en un million de minuscules fragments.{/n} « Je... C'est d'accord. {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}. Je vais laisser entrer les murmures. Vous feriez mieux de reculer un peu, juste au cas où... enfin, vous savez quoi. »
languages.original_text: {n}Idira drops the psy-stifler on the floor, where it shatters into a million tiny pieces.{/n} "I'll... I'll do it. Lord Captain. I'll let the whispers in. You better step back in case... well, in case you-know-what."

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira laisse tomber le carcan psychique qui se brise en un million de minuscules fragments.{/n} « Je... C'est d'accord. {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}. Je vais laisser entrer les murmures. Vous feriez mieux de reculer un peu, juste au cas où... enfin, vous savez quoi. »
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}İdira'nın ruhboğanı yere bırakmasıyla cihaz, milyonlarca minik parçaya ayrılıyor.{/n} "Yapacağım Lord Captain. Fısıltıları içeri alacağım. Geri çekilsen iyi olur... Ne olur ne olmaz."
languages.original_text: {n}Idira drops the psy-stifler on the floor, where it shatters into a million tiny pieces.{/n} "I'll... I'll do it. Lord Captain. I'll let the whispers in. You better step back in case... well, in case you-know-what."

traits.locale_text: {n}İdira ruhboğanı yere bırakıyor ve cihaz milyonlarca minik parçaya ayrılıyor.{/n} "Yapacağım Lord Captain. Fısıltıları içeri alacağım. Geri çekilsen iyi olur... Ne olur ne olmaz."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion
